description:
The series tells the story of Ragnar Lodbrok , a young man who considers himself a descendant of Odin. Ragner is a warrior and farmer with Lagertha married woman who manufactures shells, with whom he has two young children. Visionary dreaming and live many adventures , he believes that their imagined wealth for his people are beyond the Baltic Sea .

Her dreams lead him to become an important figure in the village , which causes some tension between him and his brother Rollo , a cruel man who envies the rise of Ragnar . But his biggest challenge is to convince Jarl Haraldson , the leader of his people , to allow him to gather warriors to travel north .

Fearing losing its fleet , Haraldson prefer to send their boats to the east . He has not yet overcome the death of his two flhos , although it still has Thyri , the daughter he had with Siggy , his wife , a woman who has divided loyalty to her husband . Disobeying their leader , Ragnar begins to gather a small army, enlisting the help of his best friend Floki man who designs and builds boats .
